BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Kings County Democratic Committee recommending the name of Rodney L. Pepe-Souvenir to the Council regarding her appointment to the office of Commissioner of Elections of the Board of Elections pursuant to ยง 3-204 (4) of the New York State Election Law.
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Rodney L. Pepe-Souvenir, Office of Commissioner of Elections of the Board of Elections.

Items.Title: Resolution amending Rule 7.00 of the Rules of the Council in relation to changes in membership to the Standing Committees of the Council and the Land Use Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises.

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Changes in membership to the Standing Committees of the Council and the Land Use Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises.

Items.Title: Resolution amending Rule 7.00 of the Rules of the Council in relation to dissolving the Committee on the Justice System and transferring its jurisdiction to the Standing Committees on Public Safety and General Welfare.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Dissolving the Committee on the Justice System and transferring its jurisdiction to the Standing Committees on Public Safety and General Welfare.

Items.Title: Communication from the Kings County Democratic Committee recommending the name of Rodney L. Pepe-Souvenir to the Council regarding her appointment to the office of Commissioner of Elections of the Board of Elections pursuant to ยง 3-204 (4) of the New York State Election Law.
